body.p:
To His Excellency Beriah McGoffen
Governor of Kentucky

The Undersigned Citizens of Christian County would represent to your Excellency that at the March Term 1862 of the Christian Circuit Court a Judgment was obtained in behalf of the Commonwealth of Kentucky against M D Brown George Elliott and John W Boyd Sr as Sureties of J C Bentley (on forfeit) recognizance for One Hundred and fifty Dollars and Your Petitioners believe the Case above mentioned presents Strong grounds for the interposition of the executive and would most respectfully ask your excellency to remit Said Judgment and release said parties from the payment of the same

Jno. B. Gowen Late S C C
